title: Kurnool bus blaze: How 400 smartphones on Bengaluru-Hyderabad route intensified fire
content: A Kurnool bus fire, which killed at least 20 people, is being investigated, with forensic experts suggesting exploding smartphone batteries contributed to the blaze. The incident highlights safety lapses in private bus operations, including non-functional emergency exits and unauthorized electrical modifications that overload systems.

title: MP shocker: 2 Australian cricketers stalked, molested in Indore
content: Two Australian cricketers were allegedly followed and molested by a man in Indore while returning to their hotel. The incident occurred on Thursday morning, prompting the team's security manager to file a complaint. Police have identified and booked a suspect following a CCTV footage review.

title: RBI vs SBI economists: Plagiarism allegations posted on LinkedIn; here’s what happened
content: An RBI economist has accused SBI of plagiarizing its Monetary Policy Reports in recent Ecowrap publications. The SBI team has dismissed the allegations, asserting their research methodology is distinct and original.

title: Cognizant hiring: CEO says Arts graduates wanted not CS; here's his reason why
content: Cognizant CEO Ravi Kumar S announces the IT firm is hiring more school graduates than ever in 2025, actively recruiting liberal arts majors from community colleges alongside traditional STEM candidates. Kumar tells Fortune that AI creates entry-level opportunities by amplifying human potential rather than displacing workers. He advises students to focus on interdisciplinary skills, combining fields like history with computational abilities. The CEO emphasizes that as AI makes expertise accessible, applying intelligence becomes more valuable than specialisation, with faster paths to expertise for graduates who leverage AI tools effectively.

title: Did Osama escape to Pak dressed as a woman? Ex-CIA officer makes new revelations
content: Former CIA officer John Kiriakou claims Osama bin Laden escaped Tora Bora disguised as a woman, aided by a compromised translator.  US forces believed they had him cornered in 2001, but he slipped into Pakistan.  Kiriakou also revealed early Al-Qaeda-Lashkar-e-Taiba links and Pakistan's complex role in counterterrorism efforts.

title: Kohli with a cheeky smile; first run of ODI series vs AUS arrives - Watch
content: A simple single run by Virat Kohli at the Sydney Cricket Ground ignited the crowd, offering a spark of relief and amusement after previous low scores.  This moment, celebrated with a standing ovation, underscored his significant connection with the venue and his resilience. Earlier, India's bowlers, led by Harshit Rana, had restricted Australia to 236.

title: Why more people are exchanging gold jewellery instead of buying?
content: Soaring gold prices are transforming the festive season into a gold exchange bonanza across India. Shoppers are increasingly trading old jewellery for new pieces, with exchanges now forming a significant portion of sales for major retailers. This trend, driven by rising prices impacting purchasing power, is particularly strong in northern, western, and eastern regions.

title: ‘Heart of generational moment’: Satya Nadella shares annual letter with stakeholders
content: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella's annual letter reveals record fiscal 2025 results with $281.7 billion revenue and $128.5 billion operating income. Azure surpassed $75 billion revenue, growing 34% year-over-year. The company giant now operates 400+ datacenters across 70 regions, with Copilot reaching 100 million monthly active users. Microsoft announced $4 billion investment in AI skills training through Microsoft Elevate initiative, targeting 20 million people over two years. Nadella emphasises the company's "think in decades, execute in quarters" philosophy amid the AI platform shift.

title: Facebook's new India bet: 30% in Reliance AI venture; Rs 855cr investment
content: Meta's Facebook Overseas acquires 30% stake in Reliance Enterprise Intelligence Limited (REIL), Mukesh Ambani's new AI venture, with joint investment of Rs 855 crore. The partnership will deploy Meta's Llama AI models through Reliance's enterprise network to offer platform-as-a-service and industry-specific AI solutions across sales, marketing, and customer service. This collaboration extends the 2020 strategic relationship when Facebook invested $5.7 billion in Jio Platforms, strengthening Meta's presence in India's growing digital economy and enterprise AI market.

title: 'Captain ka darja': Virat Kohli grabs Shubman Gill's arm - Watch
content: India, trailing 0-2, aimed to salvage pride in the final ODI against Australia. Despite a solid start by the visitors, India's bowlers, guided by the experience of Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, restricted Australia to 236. Kohli's on-field interactions with captain Shubman Gill proved crucial in the team's bowling and fielding efforts.

title: ‘Half of UP boys would be unmarried if…’: Vote asked as 'dowry' before Bihar polls
content: Ballia MP Sanatan Pandey urged Bihar voters to support the Mahagathbandhan, framing their votes as 'dowry' for the deep social and cultural ties between Uttar Pradesh and Bihar. He highlighted the 'roti, beti ka sambandh' and credited RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav's job creation for benefiting UP youth, encouraging them to reciprocate with votes.

title: OpenAI’s Airbnb ties: Brian Chesky to friend Sam Altman; can’t use ChatGPT right now
content: Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky expressed interest in integrating OpenAI's ChatGPT, but found its current SDK insufficient for their needs. While Airbnb already uses AI, the trend favors customizable open-source models, with Chinese tech giants like Alibaba leading the charge by releasing advanced, cost-effective systems and fostering a vast open-source AI ecosystem.

title: Satara doctor accused MP of harassment; claimed police ignored June complaint
content: A 28-year-old doctor's alleged suicide in Maharashtra has taken a disturbing turn. Reports reveal she previously accused a Member of Parliament of pressuring her over a fitness certificate for an arrested individual. The doctor, who faced alleged sexual assault and harassment, had reportedly complained about police intimidation and pressure to alter medical reports, with no action taken.

title: Kohli-Rohit go level with Tendulkar-Dravid with all-time record - a look in numbers
content: Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma have equaled Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid's record of 391 matches played together across all formats. This milestone highlights their enduring partnership in Indian cricket, spanning 60 Tests, 225 ODIs, and 106 T20Is. Their joint journey reflects the evolution of the game across different eras and formats.

title: Football: Messi, Argentina's Kerala friendly cancelled - here's why
content: Argentina's national football team, including star Lionel Messi, will not visit Kerala in November for a planned friendly match. The Argentina Football Association cited the state's lack of readiness and logistical delays for the cancellation. Organisers are proposing a reschedule to March 2026, but this faces potential conflicts with local elections.

title: Silver falls from record high! Here's why the white metal's prices fell 17%
content: Silver prices have plummeted 17% from their record high, dropping significantly over the past ten days due to improved London availability and investor profit-taking. Despite this sharp decline, experts believe the long-term fundamentals for both silver and gold remain strong, with potential for renewed buying interest amid global uncertainties.

title: 'Your phones are on radar': Maharashtra BJP minister to party members
content: Revenue Minister Chandrashekhar Bawankule warned BJP workers about their mobile phones and WhatsApp groups being monitored, urging discipline ahead of local polls. Shiv Sena's Sanjay Raut condemned this as a privacy breach, demanding the minister's arrest. Bawankule later clarified that the party links booth-level WhatsApp groups to its war room for communication and feedback.

title: Agra accident: 5 killed, 2 injured as speeding car hits pedestrians
content: A tragic incident near Nagla Budhi has claimed five lives. A speeding car struck pedestrians, killing five and injuring two. The victims were rushed to Sarojini Naidu Medical College where they were declared dead. Eyewitnesses reported the car hit a divider before veering off. The driver has been arrested and the vehicle seized.

title: Faridabad man rapes teen daughter for several days after wife leaves him
content: Faridabad police apprehended a 42-year-old man accused of repeatedly raping his 14-year-old daughter over two months. The Class 7 student, living with her father after her mother's departure due to his alleged alcohol addiction, finally confided in a neighbor when her health declined.

title: Reagan ad: Canada to halt 'anti-tariff' commercial in hope of resuming talks with US
content: Ontario Premier Doug Ford has paused an anti-tariff advertisement campaign. This move follows US President Donald Trump's decision to end trade negotiations with Canada. The campaign aimed to highlight the impact of tariffs on American workers and businesses. Ford stated the intention was to start a conversation about the economy.

title: Satara doctor suicide case: Pune techie Prashant Bankar arrested
content: Maharashtra police arrested Prashant Bankar in connection with a doctor's suicide, while sub-inspector Gopal Badne remains absconding. The doctor's note accused Bankar of mental harassment and Badne of sexual assault. She had previously complained of police intimidation and pressure to alter reports.

title: Delhi fixes Class 1 entry age at six: Schools align with NEP 2020; rollout 2026-27
content: The Delhi government will enforce a uniform admission age of six years for Class 1 in all schools from the 2026-27 session, aligning with the National Education Policy (NEP) 2020. The revised structure redefines early education stages from Nursery to Class 1, ensuring developmental readiness, reducing academic pressure, and standardising learning outcomes across Delhi’s school ecosystem.

title: ‘How does he talk to Melania?’ Trump roasted for not understanding French journalist’s accent
content: President Trump faced criticism for dismissing a French reporter's question due to her accent, stating he couldn't understand her. He later asked Attorney General Pam Bondi to answer, remarking on her "beautiful accent" but inability to comprehend. This echoes a similar incident with an Afghan reporter. Trump's response to the West Bank question was dismissive.

title: MP ‘dark Diwali’: 23 fear losing sight after using carbide guns to celebrate
content: Madhya Pradesh is grappling with a "dark Diwali" as nearly 300 people, including children, suffered eye injuries from "carbide guns." Hospitals report 23 severe cases, with vision loss uncertain for six months. Despite a government ban, social media reels promoting these dangerous DIY toys continue to spread, highlighting a critical need for online vigilance.

title: IND vs AUS: Head creates history against India; surpasses Smith
content: Travis Head has etched his name in cricketing history, becoming the fastest Australian to reach 3,000 ODI runs in just 76 innings.  Despite a brief dismissal for 29, his aggressive batting at the SCG saw him surpass Steve Smith's record. This significant achievement highlights Head's explosive batting prowess in the 50-over format.

title: Nostradamus predicted 3I/ATLAS rare interstellar object nears Earth in 2025
content: Astronomers confirmed the interstellar object 3I/ATLAS is approaching Earth, sparking public interest and comparisons to Nostradamus' prophecies. While scientists assure no threat, its unusual features and trajectory fuel speculation about cosmic mysteries and ancient predictions. This rare visitor offers a unique opportunity to study objects from beyond our solar system, enhancing our understanding of the universe.

title: 'No one complained when … ': Trump Jr's below-the-belt remark on Michelle Obama
content: Donald Trump Jr. defended his father's White House East Wing demolition with a crude meme targeting Michelle Obama, falsely claiming no one complained about a urinal in her private bathroom. The meme played into a conspiracy theory, drawing criticism from Hillary Clinton, whom Trump Jr. then attacked for alleged White House theft.

title: Singapore hospital: Indian nurse jailed over 1 year for molesting male visitor
content: An Indian nurse at Singapore's Raffles Hospital received a jail sentence of 14 months and two strokes of the cane for molesting a male visitor in a hospital toilet. The 34-year-old nurse, Elipe Siva Nagu, claimed he intended to 'disinfect' the victim. The incident, which occurred in June, caused the victim significant emotional distress.

title: Dems and GOP team up to condemn 'Hindutva in America' event at Rutgers University
content: Four members of the US Congress — Democrats Suhas Subramanyam, Shri Thanedar, Sanford Bishop, and Republican Dr. Rich McCormick — have written to Rutgers University expressing concern over an upcoming event titled “Hindutva in America: A Threat to Equality and Religious Pluralism.”

title: Bank holiday on Chhath Puja: Will banks remain closed on Oct 27? Check list
content: Banks across several states will observe closures for Chhath Puja, with Bihar and Jharkhand experiencing two-day holidays and West Bengal a one-day closure. These state-specific holidays mean banking operations in other regions will proceed as usual. Digital banking services remain accessible for customers during this period.

title: Watch: Virat Kohli takes blinder; achieves big milestone
content: Virat Kohli achieved a fielding milestone with his 77th catch against Australia, a record for a non-wicketkeeper against a single opponent. Despite this, his batting form remains a concern, with consecutive ducks in the ODI series. Kohli will aim to improve his batting in the ongoing third ODI.

title: Dowry death: Woman dies by suicide; blames husband, in-laws in video
content: A 26-year-old woman, Manjusha Goswami, died by suicide in Raipur. She allegedly recorded a video accusing her husband, in-laws, and brother-in-law of dowry harassment. Police registered a case based on her complaint. The incident occurred after a reported argument. The preliminary investigation suggests the husband found her hanging after leaving the room.

title: Yograj makes big claim about Dhoni, Kohli; calls Tendulkar 'only friend'
content: Yograj Singh, father of Yuvraj Singh, named his son as India's greatest cricketer, surpassing even Sachin Tendulkar. He also alleged that Yuvraj faced internal politics and had few allies, with Sachin Tendulkar being his only true friend. Yograj criticized MS Dhoni and Virat Kohli, claiming they feared Yuvraj's talent.

title: Watch: Diwali fireworks set homes on fire from New York to Canada
content: Illegal Diwali fireworks ignited devastating house fires in New York and Canada, rendering families homeless. In Queens, flames spread to three homes after fireworks landed on a residence. Edmonton also saw a family lose their house to a similar incident. Authorities are emphasizing strict enforcement of fireworks bans, even during cultural celebrations.

title: Are rocks alive? Truth about egg-laying rocks of China’s Guizhou province
content: In China's Guizhou province, smooth oval stones emerge from cliff faces, a geological phenomenon locals call "egg stones." Scientifically known as concretions, these form over millions of years as minerals cement within softer rock, eventually being exposed by erosion. This natural process, occurring every few decades, has inspired generations of folklore and continues to draw tourists.

title: 'Not bulletproof': FATF warns Pakistan greylist exit does not shield from scrutiny
content: The FATF cautioned Pakistan that exiting the greylist doesn't grant immunity from scrutiny over money laundering or terrorist financing. Countries, including those delisted, must continue tightening safeguards against illicit financial activities, as terror groups reportedly exploit digital wallets and crypto channels for funding.

title: ‘I will die’: UP man’s cry for help from Saudi goes viral; Indian embassy reacts
content: An Indian national from Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh, has appealed for help in a viral video, claiming he is being held against his will in Saudi Arabia. The Indian Embassy is attempting to locate him but requires more details, urging the lawyer who posted the video to provide additional information.

title: IND vs AUS: Shubman Gill’s streak continues; India’s curse refuses to end
content: India faces another toss defeat, their 18th consecutive in ODIs, as Australia chose to bat first in the third match. Despite this, the team is reportedly comfortable bowling first.

title: Bengaluru hit-and-run case: Actor Divya Suresh identified as driver
content: Kannada actress Divya Suresh has been identified as the alleged driver in a hit-and-run incident in Byatarayanapura. The early morning accident on October 4th injured three individuals riding a motorcycle.  A speeding black car, reportedly driven by Suresh, struck the victims before fleeing the scene. Investigations are ongoing following the registration of a case.

title: 'Breaking windows was our only way to escape:' Survivors recall Andhra bus tragedy
content: Tragedy struck on the Hyderabad-Bengaluru highway as a private bus caught fire, claiming 19 passengers and a biker. The inferno erupted after the bus rammed a motorcycle, dragging it for 300 meters. Trapped by a jammed exit and sealed windows, survivors bravely broke free. Authorities are expediting DNA profiling for victim identification.

title: Thailand's Queen Mother Sirikit passes away at 93; PM cancels trip to Asean
content: Queen Mother Sirikit of Thailand, a revered figure known for her rural development and conservation efforts, has passed away at age 93. Hospitalized since 2019 with various ailments, her condition worsened, leading to her death. She was the mother of the current King Vajiralongkorn and wife of the late King Bhumibol Adulyadej.

title: Chennai on high watch: Cyclone 'Montha' looms; IMD issue orange alert
content: Chennai and neighboring districts are bracing for heavy rainfall as the season's first cyclonic storm, potentially named Montha, takes shape over the Bay of Bengal. The IMD has issued an orange alert for October 27, forecasting significant downpours.

title: Sabarimala ‘gilded artefacts misappropriation’ case: SIT inspects jewellery shop in Bengaluru
content: When asked whether the SIT had confiscated the “missing gold” from Bengaluru, Devaswom Board Minister V.N. Vasavan said the “investigation was on the right track”

title: Sanjay Raut slams Devendra Fadnavis; alleges law and order collapse in Maharashtra
content: Sanjay Raut said there was no fear of the law left in the State and alleged that the Home Department, headed by Devendra Fadnavis, was functioning in an "insensitive manner"

title: Kidnapped boy rescued in Agra, two accused arrested after encounter
content: ACP Piyushkant Rai says the boy's uncle hatched a plot along with three accomplices to kidnap Jai, the four-year-old boy

title: Heavy rainfall forecast in parts of Telangana from October 27 to 29
content: According to the IMD, a cyclonic circulation over the southeast Bay of Bengal and the adjoining South Andaman Sea is currently active

title: Man attacked with iron rod in Delhi over property dispute; assault caught on camera
content: Raghuraj Singh, a resident of Aali village, was assaulted with an iron rod by two bike-borne men; the video of the incident goes viral on social media

title: Kokrajhar blast: Suspected Maoist killed in police encounter in Assam
content: Kokrajhar SP Pushpraj Singh said the encounter took place during an operation in Nadanguri, which was launched to trace militants behind the blast in Kokrajhar

title: MNS seeks probe into ‘irregularities’ in voter registrations in Navi Mumbai
content: The delegation submitted a memorandum to the Belapur returning officer, claiming there were nearly 15,000 duplicate and 18,000 fake voter names

title: TVK president Vijay to meet Karur stampede victims’ families in Mamallapuram on October 27
content: A top-level TVK leader confirmed to The Hindu that Mr. Vijay would meet the bereaved families on Monday morning. The event would be held in a closed-door format, where Mr. Vijay would interact with the family members and offer his condolences, the party leader said

title: Maoists kill two villagers in Chhattisgarh’s Bijapur
content: The cadres fled the scene after the attack, the official said, adding that the police were subsequently alerted

title: Civil Aviation Minister Naidu inaugurates refurbished T2 at Delhi airport
content: The Indira Gandhi International Airport (IGIA) in the national capital, also the country's largest airport, has three terminals — T1, T2 and T3, and four runways. It handles more than 1,300 flight movements daily

title: Savings of LIC policyholders 'systematically misused' to benefit Adani Group: Jairam Ramesh
content: "Internal documents reveal that Indian officials drafted and pushed through a proposal to invest about ₹33,000 crore of LIC funds in various Adani Group companies," Jairam Ramesh said

title: BJP leader shot in Bihar's Bhagalpur; police probe underway
content: According to residents, the incident occurred when Bablu Yadav was taking a walk outside his house. At this time, Surjikhil resident Suraj Tanti arrived at the spot with his associates and allegedly fired two rounds at him.

title: Bengaluru hit-and-run: Car driven by Kannada actress Divya Suresh, say police
content: The accident occurred in the early hours of October 4 in Byatarayanapura, Bengaluru, and the car belonged to the actress, says police

title: Maharashtra doctor death: Police detain accused named in note written on her palm
content: The doctor, hailing from Beed district and posted at a government hospital, was found dead in a hotel room in Phaltan of Satara district on October 23

title: Kurnool bus accident: Was it head-on collision or bus running over bike lying on road?
content: To get a clarity, the police are trying to gather video footage of the surveillance cameras on either side of the accident spot“

title: How Bihar has voted since 2000: Infographics
content: Bihar’s political journey since 2000- elections, party shifts, alliances, and how voters shaped the State’s power structure.

title: Lalu Prasad accuses Centre of ‘not running’ adequate Bihar-bound trains for Chhath Puja
content: The former Chief Minister also shared on his social media post a video of passengers travelling to Bihar in a packed train for the festival

title: PM Modi extends Chhath greetings
content: The Prime Minister also shared a song by noted singer Sharda Sinha, whose soulful renditions add to the festival fervour

title: Democracy ‘alien concept’ for Pakistan, must end rights abuses in occupied areas: India
content: Parvathaneni Harish underlined that the Global South must have a greater voice in global decision-making

title: Man involved in illegal arms supply injured in encounter in Delhi's Mehrauli
content: A case under relevant provisions of law has been registered against Kanishk alias Koku alias Vishal (27), a resident of Madangir, Delhi

title: Four militants involved in extortion activities arrested in Manipur
content: One pistol with ammunition was recovered from his possession, and he was involved in extortion and the collection of funds from the town area of Churachandpur, says a senior police officer

title: Maharashtra leaders seek SIT, independent inquiry into woman doctor’s death
content: The doctor, hailing from Beed district and posted at a government hospital in Phaltan, was found dead in a hotel room

title: Delhi govt to implement uniform admission age of 6+ years for Class 1 from 2026-27
content: According to a circular issued by the Directorate of Education (DoE), the foundational stage currently comprises two classes — Nursery and KG — followed by Class 1, with minimum ages for admission being 3+, 4+ and 5+ years, respectively

title: Indian national working as staff nurse jailed for molesting male visitor at Singapore hospital
content: Elipe Siva Nagu, 34, molested a male visitor to the Raffles Hospital in June, after claiming that he wanted to “disinfect” the victim.

title: Bihar Assembly election LIVE: Every single word of PM Modi's speech was defamatory for Bihar, says Tejashwi
content: Law and order cannot exist when the RJD is in power, the Prime Minister said. “During the RJD’s rule, extortion, murder, ransom, and kidnapping flourished in Bihar as an industry. RJD’s jungle raj has ruined many generations in Bihar,”

title: Speeding car runs over pedestrians in Agra; 5 killed, 2 injured
content: The accident occurred in the New Agra police station area, near Nagla Budhi, ahead of the Central Hindi Institute

title: Odisha on high alert ahead of cyclone, fishermen advised caution
content: While the cyclone is not expected to make a direct landfall in Odisha, it is still likely to cause widespread downpours and gusty winds

title: The orthodontist who built a museum of cameras in Chennai
content: Dr. Arun’s passion has, over the years, grown into a collection of about 5,800 still photography cameras, earning him a Guinness World Record for the largest collection of cameras and the most distinctive assemblage of film cameras

title: Governor, CM, Ministers pay tributes to late Marudhu brothers on their death anniversary
content: Ministers Thangam Thennarasu, Ma. Subramanian and P.K. Sekarbabu; Chennai Mayor R. Priya; MP Thamizhachi Thangapandian and senior officials paid floral tributes to late Marudhu brothers in Gandhi Mandapam campus in Chennai

title: Maiden flight of HTT-40 series production aircraft
content: The HTT-40 is an indigenous Basic Trainer Aircraft (BTA) designed and developed by Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) for the Indian Air Force (IAF)

title: CPI(M) seeks to ease tensions with CPI over PM-SHRI MoU
content: UDF, seemingly sensing a political opportunity, invited CPI to join the Opposition coalition. “The UDF will welcome CPI if the latter chooses to break ranks with the CPI(M)”, UDF convenor Adoor Prakash stated.

title: Trouble in ‘soy State’: Madhya Pradesh soybean farmers lose interest over multiple factors
content: Madhya Pradesh is India’s largest soybean producer, but young farmers are losing interest in farming, facing key issues such as improper implementation of minimum support price, seed quality, input cost and the possibility of the import of soybean and soybean meal from the United States. A.M. Jigeesh reports on a brewing crisis

title: Anganwadi workers’ union demands gratuity for retired employees
content: The government’s decision to provide gratuity to those who retire after 2023 should be modified and the gratuity should be applicable to all those who joined the service from 1975 and retired from 2011-12

title: BJP accuses Bengal Govt. of creating ‘fake citizens’ in border districts
content: The party claimed that these certificates are being used to create “fake voters” ahead of the Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of the electoral rolls

title: Not-for-profit forum to be launched to address cyber challenges
content: The inaugural conclave of the forum was organised by alumni of Cyber Law & Cyber Forensics Programme, NLSIU

title: In a reform push, U.P. CM Yogi approves fivefold increase in the financial powers of PWD officers
content: In the revised structure, the Chief Engineer can now approve works up to ₹10 crores, up from ₹2 crores

title: It was a mistake to join hands with RJD: Nitish
content: The JD(U) president addressed a rally in Samastipur district, from where the Prime Minister launched his campaign for the high-stakes elections

title: Pregnant woman among other migrants languish in Bangladesh even after Calcutta High Court order; Trinamool points fingers at Centre
content: It has been four weeks since the Calcutta High Court directed authorities to bring back the six migrant workers who were pushed into Bangladesh months back

title: Lokesh pitches Andhra–Victoria cricket ties, eyes IPL-level talent pipeline
content: During a visit to Melbourne, HRD Minister explores joint training camps, eco-friendly stadiums, and digital fan engagement, as Andhra’s cricketing ambitions gain global traction through the APL and IPL 2025 prospects

title: Jays use 9-run 6th to bury L.A. in statement win
content: The Blue Jays showed they're a powerhouse in their own right Friday night, putting Game 1 of the World Series away with a nine-run sixth inning and beating the Dodgers 11-4.

title: Dodgers' relief woes rear ugly head in Game 1 rout
content: A nine-run sixth-inning barrage by the Blue Jays highlighted a glaring weakness for the Dodgers, whose bullpen was hit hard again in an 11-4 rout in Game 1 of the World Series.

title: Jays fans hit Ohtani with 'don't need you' chants
content: Blue Jays fans let Shohei Ohtani hear it before and during Game 1 of the World Series, their disapproval of him not picking their team in free agency in 2023 clearly still evident Friday night at Rogers Centre.

title: Blazers move forward, win day after Billups' arrest
content: Led by interim coach Tiago Splitter, the Blazers began moving forward after the arrest of coach Chauncey Billups, earning a 139-119 win over the Warriors on Friday.

title: Mavs 0-2 as 'Fire Nico!' chants grow loud again
content: Many Mavericks fans vented their frustration Friday night, again chanting "Fire Nico!" as the final minute played out in a 117-107 loss to the Wizards that dropped Dallas to 0-2 on the season.

title: KD sees positives to Rockets' reaction to 0-2 start
content: Kevin Durant said Rockets players and coaches are "pissed off" as they fell to 0-2 with a 115-111 loss to the Pistons on Friday night, but also views that early-season frustration as a good thing.

title: NBA's Silver 'deeply disturbed' by indictments
content: NBA commissioner Adam Silver said he was "deeply disturbed" by the allegations that were presented by federal authorities against Heat guard Terry Rozier and Blazers coach Chauncey Billups.

title: UNT QB Mestemaker has record 608 yards in win
content: Redshirt freshman Drew Mestemaker passed for a school-record 608 yards with four touchdowns and North Texas scored 37 unanswered points to beat Charlotte 54-20 on Friday night.

title: UFC 321: Inside Tom Aspinall's unique heavyweight strategy
content: Tom Aspinall and his father and coach, Andy, have developed a strategy that has yet to be truly tested.

title: NBA gambling investigation live updates: Latest arrests, statements, more
content: Trail Blazers coach Chauncey Billups, Heat guard Terry Rozier and former Cavs player Damon Jones have been arrested in connection with the probes.

title: 12 more NFL Week 8 games: We have predictions, picks and wild stats
content: Aaron Rodgers vs. Green Bay? Can Bills and Ravens get back on track? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 8 game.

title: Aaron Rodgers at home with Steelers, at peace with Packers
content: There's a fire still burning inside the QB who's happy in Pittsburgh but respectful of his time in Green Bay.

title: Mbappé vs. Yamal is the new Ronaldo vs. Messi -- so which Clasico star is better?
content: Not since Messi vs. Ronaldo has the Barcelona-Real Madrid rivalry given us a matchup like Yamal vs. Mbappe. So, which superstar would you rather have?

title: Madrid vs. Barça head-to-head, form, key clashes, predictions, odds
content: When Real Madrid and Barcelona face off, there's nothing bigger happening anywhere in the soccer world.

title: NFC East roundtable: Can the defending champs take the division crown again?
content: So far, every team in the NFC East except the Eagles has played three division games. Here's how they stack up.

title: Giants-Eagles rivalry and the punt that lives in NFL infamy
content: DeSean Jackson and Matt Dodge relive a 15-year-old shank and a walk-off return that fans will never forget.

title: Thamel: Five questions that will define a wild CFB coaching carousel
content: Big-money buyouts, big-name candidates and more coaches under pressure. Let's break down college football's biggest coaching questions.

title: Shock USWNT loss shows lack of problem-solving, but no cause for alarm (yet)
content: The surprising loss to Portugal by the U.S. women's national team came from players who admit they were "on islands" and "trying to fix it on their own."

title: Piastri: Norris & I have 'clean slate' in Mexico
content: Oscar Piastri has confirmed that he and McLaren teammate Lando Norris are starting from a "clean slate" at the Mexican Grand Prix after the Australian took responsibility for their collision at the U.S. Grand Prix.

title: NBA intel: Wemby's new game plan, and early concerns for Lakers and Rockets
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst take the pulse of the league after a thrilling first few nights of 2025-26.

title: Amir Abdur-Rahim's legacy lives on 1 year after his sudden passing
content: Those closest to the late South Florida coach remember him one year after his death shocked college basketball.

title: Top 100 men's NCAA basketball players going into 2025-26
content: From seniors who have taken the national stage before to freshmen entering the spotlight, here is our 1-100.

title: Bilas' 2025 preseason All-America teams
content: From three transfers on the first team to four freshmen on the second, here are Jay Bilas' All-America teams.

title: Grateful Ducks: Oregon's Grateful Dead uniforms top best Week 9 threads in college football
content: The crowd theme for Oregon's game against Wisconsin this week is tie-dye, and the Ducks are incorporating a number of Grateful Dead motifs into their uniforms.

title: Last-minute pickups: Bucs duo of Tez Johnson, Cade Otton among top Week 8 options
content: If this heavy bye week or injuries have you seeking lineup help, we have available options to consider.

title: Survivor pool strategy: Colts, Patriots among top options in Week 8
content: NFL survivor pool strategy, predictions and picks for ESPN Eliminator Challenge Week 8, including teams to pick or save for later.

title: Steelers' 1933 striped throwbacks, Chargers' navy look top NFL Week 8 uniforms
content: It's the debut of a throwback uniform for the Steelers in Week 8, while the Eagles will also be wearing kelly green.

title: NFL Week 8's fashionable arrivals, featuring Justin Jefferson
content: From suits to streetwear, Week 8's arrivals mixed personal flair and cold-weather layers with comfort and creativity.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United optimistic over Hjulmand deal
content: Manchester United are optimistic they can secure a deal to sign Sporting CP midfielder Morten Hjulmand. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Viral Video Shows Biker Riding Recklessly Moments Before Andhra Bus Tragedy
content: Negligent riding by a drunk biker is suspected to have caused the bus inferno that left 20 people dead in Andhra Pradesh's Kurnool yesterday.

title: "False, Baseless": LIC Rejects Washington Post Report On Adani Link
content: An article in The Washington Post had claimed that officials allegedly fast-tracked a proposal in May to direct approximately $3.9 billion in investments from the LIC to an Adani group firm.

title: Video: Tea Costs Businessman Rs 75 Lakh In Kerala, Thief Runs Away With Cash
content: A tea break costed a businessman Rs 75 lakh after his bag with bundles of notes was picked by a thief in front of his eyes in Kerala.

title: Gold Sold To Jeweller Recovered In Sabarimala Temple Theft Case
content: The gold, allegedly handed over by key accused Unnikrishnan Potti to his associate Govardhan, was seized during a raid led by Superintendent of Police Sasidharan.

title: Delhi Airport's Renovated T2 Inaugurated, To Be Operational From Tomorrow
content: T2, built by the Airports Authority of India (AAI) four decades ago, was shut for renovation works in April this year. It has an annual capacity to handle 15 million passengers.

title: Bengaluru Pothole Claims Another Life, 26-Year-Old Banker Run Over By Truck
content: A 26-year-old banker working in Bengaluru died on Friday after she was run over by a truck while travelling in a two-wheeler with her brother near the Hoskuru road.

title: Sweden Says No To Rape Convict's Deportation As Crime "Wasn't Long Enough"
content: The Court of Appeal for Upper Norrland ruled that the man, Yazied Mohamed, will not be deported after serving his three-year prison sentence due to the "duration of the incident".

title: Elon Musk Urges Tesla Investors To Back $1 Trillion Pay Package, Slams Advisory Firms
content: Elon Musk, who is already the world's richest man, justified the proposal, claiming the biggest pay package in history was necessary to protect his company.

title: Doctor Who Died By Suicide Faced Police Complaint Over "Troublesome" Behaviour
content: The woman doctor who died by suicide after accusing a police officer of raping her multiple times in Maharashtra's Satara had faced allegations of hindering investigations in the past, NDTV has found.

title: How Queen Victoria Once Ran World's Biggest Drug Racket
content: Go back just over 150 years, and you find the person at the front and centre of one of the world's biggest drug empires wasn't a cartel or street thugs in South America but a queen.

title: How 234 Smartphones Worth Rs 46 Lakh Intensified Deadly Andhra Bus Fire
content: As the investigation into the Kurnool bus fire case continues, a new development has emerged. A consignment of 234 Realme smartphones were inside the bus that exploded when the accident occurred.

title: Accused Named By Maharashtra Doctor In Suicide Note Arrested
content: A team from the Phaltan police arrested Prashant Bankar, one of the two men the 28-year-old woman doctor had named in a suicide note written on her palm, from Pune.

title: Trump's H-1B Visa Reforms Will Have Mixed Effects On MBAs
content: Anti-immigration organisations and liberal economic groups alike have long attacked H-1B visas as a tool for replacing US employees with lower-paid foreign ones.

title: Delhi Sees 30% Rise In Patients With Respiratory Issues Post-Diwali
content: The sudden exposure to smoke, toxic gases, and fine particulate matter has left the elderly, children, pregnant women, and those with chronic respiratory or cardiac illnesses struggling to cope.

title: Week After Breakup, Mumbai Man Stabs Ex-Girlfriend, Then Slits Own Throat
content: A 24-year-old man in Mumbai on Friday stabbed his former girlfriend, then attacked himself. The woman, Manisha Yadav, died while the man, Sonu Barai, also died of his injuries.

title: China, US Begin Trade Talks In Malaysia Day Before ASEAN Summit
content: China and the United States began their latest round of trade talks in Malaysia on Saturday, a US Treasury spokesman and Beijing's state media said, ahead of a highly anticipated meeting of their leaders in South Korea next week.

title: Bengaluru Cab Driver Skips Toll Route, Then Assaults Woman Passenger, Arrested
content: A cab driver was arrested for allegedly assaulting his customer -- a 19-year-old college student -- following an argument over skipping the toll route to Kempegowda International Airport here, police said.

title: "We Bought Pervez Musharraf": Ex-CIA Officer Says US "Loved Working With Dictators"
content: Ex-CIA Officer John Kiriakou said that ex-Pak President Pervez Musharraf just kept the military 'happy,' and pretended to side with the US on counterterrorism while carrying out terrorist activities against India.

title: 'Carbide Guns' Injure 320 In Madhya Pradesh, Chief Minister Meets Victims
content: Doctors at Hamidia and other hospitals say that nearly 40 victims have suffered corneal damage, and for many, it may take up to six months before their vision can recover, if at all.

title: 'No Benefit In Fighting India': Ex-CIA Officer Who Led Pak Operations
content: Pakistan would lose any conventional war with India, a former US intelligence officer has said, recalling that the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) believed the two nuclear-armed nations would go to war after the 2001 Parliament attacks.

title: Japan’s new PM commits to higher defence spend, ties with India, Quad
content: Sanae Takaichi said she ‘looks forward’ to promoting the Japan-India Strategic and Global Partnership; ‘in order to promote the main pillar of Tokyo’s diplomacy, a Free and Open Indo-Pacific, India is a crucial partner,’ says an Assistant Minister

title: India is a crucial partner on Indo-Pacific; PM Takaichi committed to building ties: Japanese government spokesperson
content: PM Takaichi expected to continue foreign policy of predecessors; immigration hard-line sparks concerns

title: 103 bus stops in Bengaluru to be relocated to ease traffic congestion
content: The list of “traffic-causing” bus shelters has been sent to the Greater Bengaluru Authority (GBA), which will direct the five new municipal corporations to oversee the relocation of bus stops within their jurisdictions.

title: Tax saving drives private bus operators to use out-of-State vehicles
content: Telangana has less than 100 private long-distance buses, buses registered in other parts of the country are used to plying long-distance routes so as to save on the tax component; once an All-India Permit is available, operators can ply buses on all available routes, a senior transport officer said

title: Judicial panel to begin inquiry into Leh violence from October 25
content: Justice B.S. Chauhan-led commission to record statements over deaths of four civilians during September protests

title: ECI mandates disclosure tag on AI-generated campaign videos
content: The ECI says it has been brought to its notice that the misuse of hyper-realistic synthetically generated information, including depicting political leaders as making electorally sensitive messages, is contaminating the level-playing field in the electoral arena, disrupting fair and equal conditions for all political participants.

title: Bengaluru–Hyderabad travellers demand more train options after Kurnool bus fire tragedy
content: Currently, a total of 28 trains operate between the two capitals on different days and timings, including the Yesvantpur–Kacheguda Vande Bharat Express, according to railway officials.

title: Shahabad struggle: NDA prepares to regain lost ground in former bastion
content: While the alliance won 19 of 22 seats in the 2010 election, its tally dropped to just two seats in 2020 in the region where political dynamics is heavily influenced by the Kushwaha and Rajput communities; this time, the BJP is contesting nine seats, the JD(U) eight, the RLM two, and the LJP (RV) three

title: Zubeen Garg death: Assam SIT hopeful of Singapore’s help
content: The Special Investigating Team went to the island country to seek CCTV footage and statements from those who had accompanied the Assamese cultural icon on the yacht on the day he died

title: Kurnool tragedy: Mother and son from Bengaluru among the victims
content: The Karnataka government has sent a team of officials from the Transport Department to Kurnool in Andhra Pradesh. The officials have been instructed to identify victims from Karnataka and extend necessary assistance to their families

title: Chandrababu Naidu discusses bilateral trade, AI-based citizen services with UAE leaders
content: Food security, logistics, transportation, and infrastructure investment opportunities also come up for discussion; at a Telugu diaspora event, the Chief Minister highlights the role of the Telugus in supporting Andhra Pradesh’s growth and global collaborations

title: RBI to establish regional office in Amaravati
content: The new office will be developed in approximately 1.6 lakh square feet, with an overall investment exceeding ₹200 crore to strengthen the bank’s operational capabilities and services in the region

title: Engrossed in power fight, Congress leaders have forgotten their responsibilities, says Union Minister
content: Taking exception to what he termed as degrading language in political criticism, the Union Minister says the people of both Karnataka and Telangana were closely observing the developments and they would soon teach them a lesson

title: Samajwadi Party plans region-centric manifestos to counter BJP's narrative in Uttar Pradesh
content: Party strategists entrusted with the responsibility argue that each region has different geographical, economic challenges and opportunities, and addressing it will be the focus of the SP’s localised manifestos. The party will however release a State-level manifesto too.

title: ‘Vision 2031’ stresses on increased power generation, climate-resilient power infrastructure and new technologies
content: The draft document outlines the department’s plans for modernisation of existing hydropower projects, fostering e-mobility initiatives and the seamless integration of renewable energy and energy storage mechanisms into the Kerala power system

title: Civet coffee’s unique flavour linked to fat composition, finds Central University of Kerala study
content: Civet-processed beans are larger and contains higher fat contents than manually collected ones. Elevated level of caprylic acid and capric acid methyl esters, compounds responsible for coffee’s creamy aroma and enhanced flavour, found in civet-proceed beans, according to study

title: Paddy procurement touches record levels amidst bumper harvest in Delta districts
content: Across the districts, the procurement has increased by several times and official machinery has also transported record quantity of the produce to storage points and hulling centres

title: Bus accidents in Andhra Pradesh led to 115 deaths in 2023, a decrease from 221 deaths in 2022
content: Bus accidents in Andhra Pradesh resulted in 1.41% of the deaths due to road accidents in 2023, whereas two-wheelers resulted in over 50% of deaths due to road accidents

title: Congress, BJP spar over OBC politics in Bihar
content: Congress says Karpoori Thakur govt. fell in Bihar in late 1970s as Jan Sangh withdrew support over OBC quota, while   BJP reminds Congress of how it humiliated OBC leader Sitaram Kesri

title: Coaching tracker for 2026: Toronto Tempo hire Sandy Brondello
content: the Dallas Wings , New York Liberty and Seattle Storm cut ties with their head coaches following the 2025 season . the expansion Toronto Tempo and Portland Fire joined the WNBA next year . a day later, the Storm filled their open position by hiring from the college ranks . now, there's just one head coaching position open, at new york .

title: Survey ordered to identify areas for inclusion under Greater Bengaluru Authority limits: D.K. Shivakumar

title: Norris laughs off Red Bull sticky tape 'side quests'
content: the FIA handed Red Bull a €50,000 fine at the u.s. grand prix . a mechanic tried to re-enter the grid once the formationI lap had started to remove tape . the mechanics used tape on the pit wall as a visual aid to ensure his car was not too far forward .

title: Round 1 preview, predictions: Can anyone stop Philly?
content: the 2025 MLS Cup playoffs kicked off on Wednesday with the wild card round, which saw the ninth seeds from both the East and West get knocked out . this phase of the postseason moves quickly, with the dust on Wednesday's Wild Card games having barely settled before inter Miami and Nashville SC get Round 1 underway on Friday night . the 'futbol Americas' crew debate who's the leading contenders to win the MLS cup .

title: What we're hearing on the WNBA's CBA negotiations
content: a year ago, the WNBA players' association announced the players would opt out of their current collective bargaining agreement with the league that was set to expire following the 2025 season . the players outlined their desire for a new economic model based on equity . there are no signs a deal will be put in place by the date that the current deal expires, on Oct. 31 .

title: NHL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, plus small-sample superstars
content: a panel of ESPN hockey commentators, analysts, reporters and editors send in a 1-32 poll based on the games through Wednesday . this week's new edition of the ESPN NHL Power Rankings, we've identified a player on each team who has excelled way beyond expectations thus far .

title: UConn reveals championship rings designed by Bueckers, Fudd and Ducharme
content: the men's basketball team held a private event to receive their championship rings from their 2025 NCAA national championship run . they defeated south Carolina 82-59 in the title game, anchored by Sarah Strong's 24 points, 15 rebounds and five assists . the rings are filled with detail that represents the title won, as well as trace of team identity and tradition .

title: Toronto waited 32 years for another World Series win -- and Game 1 delivered
content: the 121st game of the world series was an exorcism . the Toronto Blue Jays were architects of an 11-4 devastation of the heavily favored Los Angeles Dodgers . in an era of copious strikeouts, the blue Jays don't. in a time of shoddy defension .

title: How Week 9 could start to bring order to the college football season
